Amazing food!  My Salad was fantastic!  My only note would be that they go heavy on salad dressings and oil in their food, so if you don't like too much dressing ask for light dressing and light oil in your main dish.  Other than that they were fantastic.  The host/manager was so on point, we were in awe watching her seamlessly handle the restaurant while we were there.  Food super fresh and great menus.  Like the create your own salad option!
